SageTVPlugin.Name: Dynamic Skip Times
SageTVPlugin.Description: Change the Forward and Reverse skip times based on the show you are watching.
SageTVPlugin.Author: tmiranda
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes:
Version 1.00:
- Moved hosting from Google Code to GitHub. No functionality changes.
Version 0.05:
- Removed need to enter "-" before rewind times.
- Added option to reset times back to default.
Version 0.04:
- Changed manifest so it's not just for desktops.
Version 0.03:
- Public beta.
